description: An efficient image classification model, pretrained on ImageNet dataset which contains images from 1,000 classes.
YOLOv7 is a state-of-the-art real-time object detector pretrained on MS COCO dataset with 80 object classes.
a keypoint detector, extended on the basis of YOLOv7, to detect keypoints in the human body. The model is pretrained on MS COCO dataset with 17 keypoints.
The instance segmentation model based on Yolov7, fine-tuned on the custom dataset with 337 images and 1 object class 'stomata'.
The instance segmentation model based on Mask R-CNN from Detectron2, fine-tuned on the 'stomata200-mix' dataset with 1 object class 'stomata'.
